home.api-auth-desc: Generate keys from the dashboard, add them to your Authorization header — revoke instantly if compromised.
home.api-crud-desc: Create, update, enable, disable, and delete redirects programmatically — the same operations available in the dashboard.
home.api-desc: Unleash the full potential of RedirHub with our detailed API documentation. Designed to support developers at every stage, the documentation provides clear and concise guidance to integrate, automate, and optimize your redirect management workflows seamlessly.
home.api-error-desc: Quickly identify and resolve issues with detailed error codes and explanations.
home.api-errors-desc: Every failed request returns a machine-readable error code and a clear message — no guessing what went wrong or how to fix it.
home.api-examples-desc: Every endpoint documented with parameters, response shapes, and working samples — copy, paste, integrate.
home.api-pagination-desc: Structured pagination for large redirect inventories — documented limits so your integration never breaks unexpectedly.
home.api-reference-desc: Access a comprehensive API reference with examples to kickstart your implementation.
home.api-scalable-desc: Leverage advanced features to automate workflows and scale your redirect management effortlessly.
home.api-subline: A REST API for creating, updating, and monitoring redirects from your own tools and deployment pipelines — everything available in the dashboard is available via API. No manual steps, no dashboard dependency.
home.api-titleline: Automate redirect management with the {{n}} API
home.choose-us-analytics-subtitle: Optimize your redirects with real-time analytics and instant updates, empowering smarter decisions and better performance.
home.choose-us-easy-subtitle: Simplify your setup with easy DNS configuration, nameservers, API integration and multi-user support.
home.choose-us-https-subtitle: Automatically secure all your redirects with HTTPS for a better user experience and SEO.
home.description: Enterprise-grade URL redirect service. Manage redirects, track analytics, and scale globally with {{n}}. Trusted by businesses worldwide.
home.features-advanced-custom-desc: Configure 301, 302, and other HTTP codes effortlessly.
home.features-advanced-desc: Harness the full power of HTTP status codes to handle a variety of redirect scenarios, from temporary redirects to permanent migrations.
home.features-advanced-seo-desc: Optimize search engine visibility with proper redirect handling.
home.features-advanced-title: Advanced Redirect Options with Custom Codes
home.features-create-csv-desc: Upload hundreds of redirects in one file — preview before publishing, live in one click.
home.features-create-desc: Set up any redirect in seconds — from a single page forward to an entire wildcard domain. No config files, no tickets to IT, no deployment pipeline.
home.features-create-title: Live Worldwide the Moment You Save
home.features-create-types-desc: Pick the right redirect type for every use case — permanent migrations, temporary campaigns, or method-preserving forwards.
home.features-create-wildcard-desc: Point an entire domain or subdomain to a new destination with one rule — *.brand.com covered in seconds.
home.features-dns-desc: Simplify DNS setup with RedirHub's streamlined tools. Configure DNS records quickly and ensure your redirects work seamlessly without technical hurdles.
home.features-dns-fast-desc: No more complex configurations—get your DNS set up in minutes.
home.features-dns-support-desc: Our team is ready to assist with any DNS-related queries.
home.features-manage-bulk-desc: Enable, disable, retag, or update destinations across multiple redirects in one action.
home.features-manage-desc: Search your entire redirect inventory, update destinations without a deployment, and catch broken links before your users do.
home.features-manage-health-desc: Automated alerts when a destination URL goes down — with fallback support to catch traffic automatically.
home.features-manage-search-desc: Find any redirect by source, destination, tag, or domain — across your whole account.
home.features-manage-title: Find, Edit, and Monitor Any Redirect Instantly
home.features-qr-branding-desc: Embed your logo and match your brand colours — print-ready in PNG or SVG.
home.features-qr-desc: Every QR code is a redirect. Update where it points anytime from the dashboard — the printed code stays the same.
home.features-qr-dynamic-desc: Update the destination URL behind any QR code at any time — no reprint, no reissue.
home.features-qr-track-desc: Monitor scan count, location, and device data — separate from URL click-throughs.
home.features-team-desc: Assign each team member exactly the access they need — full admin, edit-only, or view-only — down to the domain level.
home.features-team-domains-desc: Restrict access per domain — a team managing one brand has no visibility into another.
home.features-team-logs-desc: Keep track of changes made by team members.
home.features-team-revoke-desc: Remove a team member's access immediately — their changes remain, their access doesn't.
home.features-team-roles-desc: Define what each person can see and change — no shared credentials, no over-permissioning.
home.features-team-shared-desc: Organize redirects into shared folders for team visibility.
home.features-team-title: Marketers Move Fast. Infrastructure Stays Protected.
home.features-title: Everything you need to manage URL redirects
home.footer-cta-text: Experience the power of rapid, secure redirects and effortless management. {{n}} speeds up your workflow while keeping your domain safe.
home.hero-subtitle: Forward your domains instantly and manage all redirects from a real-time dashboard. Enhance your SEO with 301/302 redirects and secure every link with HTTPS.
home.inactivity-feature-1: Use the free plan as long as you need
home.inactivity-feature-3: Multiple upgrade options when you're ready
home.inactivity-subtitle: Take {{n}} for a spin. It's 100% free - no commitment, no risk and no pressure.
home.inactivity-trust: See why thousands of people trust {{n}} with their redirects, links management and analytics.
home.inline-cta-text: Get redirects in under 100 ms – with automatic HTTPS, analytics, and zero configuration.
home.title: {{n}} - Fast & Secure URL Redirect Management
home.why-hostnames-desc: Hostnames actively managed, providing robust answer for businesses
home.why-locations-desc: Points of Presence worldwide for reliable, global coverage
home.why-rapid-desc: Average redirect latency, ensuring quick, seamless user experiences
home.why-rapid-requests-desc: Redirects handled in the last 24 hours, showcasing our platform's scale and reliability
home.why-ssl-desc: SSL certificates issued in past 60 days, enhancing data security for users
home.why-uptime-desc: Uptime guarantee, ensuring consistent access, dependable performance for all users
